Translations.Text: Your Lord knows that you rise a little less than two thirds of the night, and half of it, and one third of it, as well as a group of those who are with you. And God measures the night and the day. He knows that you will not be able to keep-up, so He pardons you. So study what is made easy of the Quran. He knows that there will be sick among you, and others that venture out in the land seeking from God's bounty, and others who are fighting in the cause of God, so study what you can of it. And hold the contact-method and contribute towards betterment and give God a loan of righteousness. And whatever you put forth yourselves, you will find it with God, for it is better and a greater reward. And seek God's forgiveness, for God is Forgiving, Merciful
O you blanketed one
Stand and warn
And your Lord glorify
And purify your outer garments
And leave all that is vile
And do not give expecting something in return
And to your Lord be patient
So when the trumpet is sounded
That will be a very difficult Day
Upon the rejecters it will not be easy
So leave Me alone with the one I have created
And I gave him abundant wealth
And children to bear witness
And I made everything comfortable for him
Then he is greedy wanting that I give more
No. He was stubborn to Our revelations
I will exhaust him in climbing
He thought and he analyzed
So woe to him for how he thought
Then woe to him for how he thought
Then he looked
Then he frowned and became bad tempered
Then he turned away and was arrogant
So he said: "This is nothing but the magic of old
This is nothing but the words of a human
I will cast him in the Scorching heat
And do you know what is Scorching heat
It does not spare nor leave anything
A scorcher of mankind
Upon it is nineteen

And We have made the guardians of the Fire to be Angels; and We did not make their number except as a test for those who have rejected, so that those who were given the Scripture would understand, and those who have faith would be increased in faith, and so that those who have been given the Scripture and the believers do not have doubt, and so that those who have a sickness in their hearts and the rejecters would Say: "What did God mean with an example such as this" It is such that God misguides whom He wishes, and He guides whom He wishes. And none know your Lord's soldiers except Him. And it is but a reminder for mankind
No, by the moon
And by the night when it withdraws
And by the morning when it brightens
It is one of the great ones
A warning to mankind
For any among you who wishes to advance or regress
Every soul is held by what it earned
Except for the people of the right
In paradises they will ask one another
About the criminals
What has caused you to be in the scorching heat
They said: "We were not of those who reached out
And we did not feed the poor person
And we used to participate with those who spoke falsehood
And we used to deny the Day of Judgment
Until the certainty came to us
So no intercession of intercessors can help them
Why have they turned away from being reminded
They are like fleeing zebras
Running from the lion
Alas, every one of them wants to be given separate scriptures
No, they do not fear the Hereafter
No, it is a reminder
So whosoever wishes will remember it
And none will remember except if God wills. He is the source of righteousness and the source of forgiveness
